name: FastVPS Eesti OU Open Source projects
body:
## Welcome to FastVPS open source repository  

### FastNetMon - DDoS attack monitoring tool

https://github.com/FastVPSEestiOu/fastnetmon

### Antidoto - malware detection tool for Linux

https://github.com/FastVPSEestiOu/antidoto

### Ploop userspace - userspace implementation of OpenVZ's ploop disk image 

https://github.com/FastVPSEestiOu/ploop_userspace

### Flood Shield - a very fast http flood blocker for Linux

https://github.com/FastVPSEestiOu/flood_shield

### OpenVZ network shaper

https://github.com/FastVPSEestiOu/openvz-network-shaper
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
